* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [likes gold](/wiki/Gold_lover "Gold lover").
* likes gems.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* hits creatures as a +3 weapon.
* may [turn against you](/wiki/Treachery "Treachery") when tame. |                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                          |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2252](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2252 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c")         |

- *For the monster in other variants, see [deep dragon](/wiki/Deep_dragon "Deep dragon").*

A **deep dragon**, D, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). It is an adult [dragon](/wiki/Dragon_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Dragon (SLASH'EM)") associated with [life draining](/wiki/Life_drain "Life drain"). Like all dragons, deep dragons are [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong"), [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivorous "Carnivorous"), [oviparous](/wiki/Oviparous "Oviparous"), [thick-skinned](/wiki/Thick-skinned "Thick-skinned"), can [see invisible](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible"), and are capable of [flight](/wiki/Flight "Flight") - they will also seek out [gold](/wiki/Gold "Gold"), [gems](/wiki/Gems "Gems") and [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item") to pick up. [Tame](/wiki/Tame "Tame") deep dragons may turn [traitor](/wiki/Traitor "Traitor").

Deep dragons have a [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison") [breath](/wiki/Breath "Breath") weapon, a strong bite attack that can drain levels, and two claw attacks. Deep dragons possess [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance") and [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), and [hit as a +3 weapon](/wiki/Hits_creatures_as_%2Bx_weapon "Hits creatures as +x weapon").

Deep dragon [corpses](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") are poisonous to eat, but eating a deep dragon corpse or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") always grans poison resistance.

## Generation

Randomly generated deep dragons are always created hostile. A [baby deep dragon](/wiki/Baby_deep_dragon_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Baby deep dragon (SLASH'EM)") can [grow up](/wiki/Grow_up "Grow up") into a deep dragon.

[Heroes](/wiki/Hero "Hero") and monsters that [polymorph](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") while wearing [deep dragon scales](/wiki/Deep_dragon_scales "Deep dragon scales") or [deep dragon scale mail](/wiki/Deep_dragon_scale_mail "Deep dragon scale mail") will turn into deep dragons.

Deep dragons may appear among the hostile D generated in [throne rooms](/wiki/Throne_room "Throne room"), and can also appear among the monsters randomly generated by [looting](/wiki/Looting "Looting") a [throne](/wiki/Throne "Throne") while [confused](/wiki/Confused "Confused") and carrying gold (provided there is no [chest](/wiki/Chest "Chest") on the level).[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) Deep dragons may also appear in [dragon lairs](/wiki/Dragon_lair "Dragon lair") and [the Wyrm Caves](/wiki/The_Wyrm_Caves "The Wyrm Caves").[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

Deep dragons have a 1⁄3 chance of dropping a set of uncursed +0 deep dragon scales upon death unless [disintegrated](/wiki/Disintegrated "Disintegrated"), and the chance is reduced to 1⁄20 if the dragon was [revived](/wiki/Revived "Revived").

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [mkroom.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 783](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/mkroom.c#line783 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/mkroom.c")
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [mkroom.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 335](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/mkroom.c#line335 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/mkroom.c")

Deep dragon (SLASH'EM)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
D deep dragon
Difficulty 27
Attacks Breath 4d10 poisonous, bite 4d8 drain life, claw 3d4, claw 3d4
D deep dragon
Difficulty 27
Attacks

Breath 4d10 poisonous, bite 4d8 drain life, claw 3d4, claw 3d4

Base level 18
Base experience 720
Speed 9
Base AC -4
Base MR 20
Alignment -6 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 3 (Rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 4500
Nutritional value 1500
Size Gigantic
Resistances level drain, poison
Resistances conveyed poison (100%)

A deep dragon:

  • can fly.
  • has no hands.
  • has a thick hide.
  • can lay eggs.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • hits creatures as a +3 weapon.
  • may turn against you when tame.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line2252
For the monster in other variants, see deep dragon.

A deep dragon, D, is a type of monster that appears in SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM. It is an adult dragon associated with life draining. Like all dragons, deep dragons are strong, carnivorous, oviparous, thick-skinned, can see invisible, and are capable of flight - they will also seek out gold, gems and magical items to pick up. Tame deep dragons may turn traitor.

Deep dragons have a poison breath weapon, a strong bite attack that can drain levels, and two claw attacks. Deep dragons possess drain resistance and poison resistance, and hit as a +3 weapon.

Deep dragon corpses are poisonous to eat, but eating a deep dragon corpse or tin always grans poison resistance.

Generation

Randomly generated deep dragons are always created hostile. A baby deep dragon can grow up into a deep dragon.

Heroes and monsters that polymorph while wearing deep dragon scales or deep dragon scale mail will turn into deep dragons.

Deep dragons may appear among the hostile D generated in throne rooms, and can also appear among the monsters randomly generated by looting a throne while confused and carrying gold (provided there is no chest on the level).[1] Deep dragons may also appear in dragon lairs and the Wyrm Caves.[2]

Deep dragons have a 1⁄3 chance of dropping a set of uncursed +0 deep dragon scales upon death unless disintegrated, and the chance is reduced to 1⁄20 if the dragon was revived.

References

  1. ↑ mkroom.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 783
  2. ↑ mkroom.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 335

{{for|the monster in other variants|deep dragon}}

A '''deep dragon''', {{monsym|deep dragon}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[SLASH'EM]] and [[SlashTHEM]]. It is an adult [[Dragon (SLASH'EM)|dragon]] associated with [[life drain]]ing. Like all dragons, deep dragons are [[strong]], [[carnivorous]], [[oviparous]], [[thick-skinned]], can [[see invisible]], and are capable of [[flight]] - they will also seek out [[gold]], [[gems]] and [[magical item]]s to pick up. [[Tame]] deep dragons may turn [[traitor]].

Deep dragons have a [[poison]] [[breath]] weapon, a strong bite attack that can drain levels, and two claw attacks. Deep dragons possess [[drain resistance]] and [[poison resistance]], and [[Hits creatures as +x weapon|hit as a +3 weapon]].

Deep dragon [[corpse]]s are poisonous to eat, but eating a deep dragon corpse or [[tin]] always grans poison resistance.

==Generation==
Randomly generated deep dragons are always created hostile. A [[Baby deep dragon (SLASH'EM)|baby deep dragon]] can [[grow up]] into a deep dragon.

[[Hero]]es and monsters that [[polymorph]] while wearing [[deep dragon scales]] or [[deep dragon scale mail]] will turn into deep dragons.

Deep dragons may appear among the hostile {{white|D}} generated in [[throne room]]s, and can also appear among the monsters randomly generated by [[looting]] a [[throne]] while [[confused]] and carrying gold (provided there is no [[chest]] on the level).{{refsrc|mkroom.c|783|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}} Deep dragons may also appear in [[dragon lair]]s and [[the Wyrm Caves]].{{refsrc|mkroom.c|335|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}

Deep dragons have a {{frac|3}} chance of dropping a set of uncursed +0 deep dragon scales upon death unless [[disintegrated]], and the chance is reduced to {{frac|20}} if the dragon was [[revived]].
